description.en: Using the “Metropolitan Supremacy” System, Yang Ning, the main character, obtained the ability to discern and assess valuable antiques. He encounters the beautiful Lin ManXuan and the cute TongTong who are amazed by his excellent skills. With their connections, he manages to enter the Lins’ company which excels in appraising antiques. When he discoveres that the Lin sisters’ lives are being threatened, he increases his physique stats using props bought through the system and transforms from zero to hero. That is just the beginning. He enters a complex world where merely the ability to discern valuables is not enough. He needs to use the money he has to trade for points through the system to upgrade the quality of his body and use different kinds of items he can buy to strengthen himself. Not only does he get stronger, but he also gains abilities such as Eyes of the Perceiver that allows him to strive in the appraisal industry like a duck in water. Under Lin ManXuan's recommendation, he decided to participate in the appraising competition.
